title: Magic
lyrics:
Call it magic
Call it true
Call it magic
When I'm with you
And I just got broken
Broken into two

Still I call it magic

When I'm next to you



And I don't, And I don't, And I don't, And I don't

Know, I don't, it's true

I don't know, I don't know, I don't know, I don't

When anybody ask but you

I don't know, I don't know, I don't know, I don't

Know, I don't, it's true

I don't know, I don't know, I don't know, I don't

When anybody ask but you



Ooooh ooh ooh



Call it magic

Cut me into two

And with all your magic

I disappear from view

And I can't get over

Can't get over you

Still I call it magic

It's such a passion doom



And I don't, And I don't, And I don't, And I don't

Know, I don't, it's true

I don't know, I don't know, I don't know, I don't

When anybody ask but you

I don't know, I don't know, I don't know, I don't

Know, I don't, it's true

I don't know, I don't know, I don't know, I don't

When anybody ask but you



I Wanna fall

fall so far

I wanna fall

I fall so hard

And I call it magic

And I call it true

I call it magic



Ooooh ooh ooh

Ooooh ooh ooh

Ooooh ooh ooh

Ooooh ooh ooh



And if you were to ask me

After all that we've been through

Still believe in magic

Oh yes I do

Oh yes I do

Yes I do

Oh yes I do

Of course I do
